snippet: An advisory group presented a plan to finance a new $1.1 billion multipurpose stadium on the site of the team’s current home, Qualcomm Stadium.
abstract: Municipal advisory group in San Diego presents plan to finance new $1.1 billion stadium as part of bid to retain NFL's San Diego Chargers; multipurpose structure would be built on site of team's Qualcomm Stadium; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: An advisory group presented a plan to finance a new $1.1 billion multipurpose stadium on the site of the team’s current home, Qualcomm Stadium.

headline.print_headline: Plan for a New Chargers Home
